General.Name: Huaneng Lancang River Hydropower Inc Class A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Huaneng Lancang River Hydropower Inc. engages in the development, construction, operation, and management of hydropower projects. It is also involved in the solar energy and wind power generation; and production and supply of heat. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Kunming, China. Huaneng Lancang River Hydropower Inc. is a subsidiary of China Huaneng Group Co., Ltd.
General.Address: No.1, Century City Middle Road, Kunming, China, 650214
